Iddo Island bụ mpaghara dị na Lagos Mainland LGA nke Lagos
N'ihu Lagos Island, Iddo bụbu agwaetiti, mana n'ihi mkpocha ala, bụzi akụkụ nke obodo Lagos Mainland ndị ọzọ. Àgwàetiti Iddo jikọtara ya na Lagos Island site na Eko Bridge na Carter Bridge

Tupu ebe a na-ekpofu ahịhịa, a jikọtara Iddo na Lagos Mainland site na Denton Bridge, nke aha ya bụ Sir George Chardin Denton, onye bụbu Lieutenant Governor nke Colony of Lagos. Iddo bụ ebe obibi nke Lagos Terminus ma bụrụkwa ebe mbụ na naanị ebe na Naijiria iji kwado ọrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè - na-ejikọ Lagos Island site na Carter Bridge.
Ndị Awori tọrọ ntọala Lagos na narị afọ nke iri na atọ, Olofin Ogunfuminire na ndị na-eso ụzọ ya biri na Iddo, ndị ụmụ ha ka nwere ma na-achị Iddo Island taa
Lagos bụ obodo ndị Yoruba, a makwara ya dị ka Eko

Ndị ọchịchị nke Isale Eko na Lagos Island kemgbe ahụ sitere n'aka onye agha Awori Ashipa onye bụ Gọvanọ mbụ nke obodo ahụ nke Oba nke Benin họpụtara onye ọ chebere ọdịmma ya, ebe ndị nwe ala (Idejo) bụ ndị Yoruba bụ ndị na-achọpụta agbụrụ ha na Chief Olofin Ogunmire. Nwa Ashipa, Ado, wuru obí ya na Lagos Island, wee si n'àgwàetiti Iddo kwaga oche gọmentị na Lagos Island.
